By Lisa Shock on Saturday, September 3, 2011 - 07:35 am:

Since we have never found a CD that makes that monster, just DVDs and a game, so, you can't. You need to get a copy of one of the DVD's that make the monster, or a copy of MR Hop A Bout, which goes for about $5 on ebay right now.
